name: Patryk's Sumo
description:
In order to save the game and improve performance you must download the full version below. The browser version is only a demo and DOES NOT support saving and loading.

Welcome to Patryk's Sumo, the game where you can create your own sumo wrestler, practice in various environments, and participate in sumo tournaments to climb up the ranks.

Simulation Mode

In this mode you can test out the possibilities of creating the world of sumo and watch generated rikishi in their careers. 

Career Mode

Here you can create your own rikishi and follow him in the journey to become the next yokozuna. Select from a variety of different fighting styles and enforce your own brand of sumo - become a pusher-thruster, a yotsu-specialist, a rikishi whose throws will surprise opponents, or even a versatile fighter ready for every opponent. 

Features

  • A unique world with ~700 rikishi, each with realistic attributes generated randomly, so every new game is different.
  • Availability to simulate up to 30 years before creating your player, so the world has a history and legendary wrestlers whose accomplishments you will chase.
  • Statistics for every sumo wrestler and leaderboards: most wins, most special awards, most gold stars, and many more.
  • A full banzuke ranking  system with realistic promotions and demotions
  • Three different practice environments:
    • Dohyo: participate in sumo-specific drills to improve your technique
    • Gym: train with weights to get stronger physically
    • Town: have fun with your stablemates or meet with fans in various ways
  • Unlock special secret features by progressing through the ranks!
